snippet: A former executive at Petrobras, now in jail, testified that many top political figures were involved in a kickback scheme, according to a magazine report.
abstract: Confidential testimony reveals details of kickback scandal involving Brazilian oil giant Petrobras and dozens of top figures in Pres Dilma Rousseff's governing coalition; revelations complicate a tough re-election bid by Rousseff as Brazilians prepare to vote in national election in October.
lead_paragraph: A former executive at Petrobras, now in jail, testified that many top political figures were involved in a kickback scheme, according to a magazine report.

headline.main: Oil Scandal Erupts Again as Brazilians Near Election
headline.print_headline: Oil Scandal Erupts Again as Brazilians Near Election
